title: Ep. 754 Socialism Is for Imbeciles
description:
Summary:
In this episode I address the myth of “Democratic Socialism” and the useful idiots who propagate it. I also discuss some explosive new connections in the Spygate scandal. 
 
News Picks:
Today’s edition of liberal myth-busting: Is there really a “Muslim ban”? 
 
Some key insights from Rod Rosenstein’s testimony on the Hill. 
 
What’s going on with the investigation into the investigators?
 
Big time narrative-buster: Trump’s approval among Hispanics is up ten points. 
 
Did the FBI ignore evidence that it was being lied to?
 
Obama is back in the game. 
 
Copyright CRTV. All rights reserved.
